entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
